doc.title: Duelos de pasarelas
doc.plot: A delightful, charming romantic dramedy that follows the (mis)adventures of Natalia (Marjorie de Sousa), a beautiful Latina beauty queen with dreams of becoming a star in the world of international fashion modeling. Recently crowned at yet another beauty contest, Natalia seeks out new adventures and challenges when she moves to Miami to stay with her best friend Ana (Mariana Huerdo), a Latin spitfire, and Ana's flame, the sexy photographer Carlos (Carlos Caballero). But Natalia's dreams of runway glory take a few unexpected (and hilarious) turns when she bumps into Esteban (Victor Gonzalez), a hotshot fashion executive and his ex-girlfriend Vanessa (Evelin Santos), a devilishly cunning beauty and current top model who'll stop at nothing to keep her title.
